item.title: Honeyhttpd for threathunting
item.description: I. Introduction Brief overview of the use case: ingesting web data into Elasticsearch with HoneyPot HTTPD I recently set out to ingest web traffic data into our SIEM solution, which requires data to be ingested in a specific format. After researching various options, I sought an easy-to-use solution that could integrate with our existing Elasticsearch setup. One tool that caught my attention was HoneyPot HTTPD.
